title: G-code Laser Engraver Visualizer
text:
A tool for visualizing G-code used in laser engraving and cutting.

Features:
- Paste G-code to visualize paths
- Color-coded power levels
- Travel vs. cut path distinction
- SVG output
- Dimensional statistics

Open G-code Visualizer

This tool is useful for previewing laser cutter operations before sending them to the machine.
